attributes.additional_details:
The Government has made punishment a laughing matter in this country, it must be changed by:
Introducing capital punishment again for rapists', murderers & child molesters.
Making sentences for people who steal longer, such as 10-12 years, however if they kidnap a child, they should be sentenced to 20 years. jail time should also go back to what it used to be, no entertainment, just food, water, a toilet & a bed.
